thread.title: London Bridge area evacuated and put on security lockdown
thread.title_full: London Bridge area evacuated and put on security lockdown

author: admin
title: London Bridge area evacuated and put on security lockdown
text:
London Bridge area evacuated and put on security lockdown London Bridge area evacuated and put on security lockdown By 
Published time: 7 Mar, 2017 15:03 Edited time: 7 Mar, 2017 15:35 
Police have cleared London Bridge and the adjacent rail station as part of a major security operation following reports of a suspicious vehicle. 
Several buildings and a gym were evacuated, as well as part of Borough food market while police carry out a security operation. 
Social media shows police manning a cordon in the area, which was reportedly flooded with emergency service personnel. London Bridge entirely evacuated either side of our office. We’re told to move away from the windows. Oh yeah now I feel safe pic.twitter.com/fmOdKJjnRj 
— Louise Fisher (@loufisher) March 7, 2017 
A woman who had been evacuated from the gym told the Standard newspaper: “ The bus station just outside is closed – someone mentioned a suspicious vehicle but that was a bystander rather than a police officer. 
“ Looks like some of the office buildings may have been evacuated. The rail station is apparently open if you access via the escalator under the Shard. There are lots of police vehicles and at least two fire engines are onsite. 
A police spokesperson said: “ We were called to a security alert in London Bridge Street at 1.40pm. The bus station and part of the rail station has been evacuated as a precaution. 
“ The incident is ongoing. ” 
Some eyewitnesses report that police are investigating an abandoned car at the scene. 
Platforms 10 to 15 at the station and tube services have not been affected, the Standard reports. 
DETAILS TO FOLLOW
